message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $12000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to spend right now.  Would you be open to $9000?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $10000 for this product. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
